org.jgrapes.http.annotation

Annotation Type RequestHandler


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
 @HandlerDefinition(evaluator=RequestHandler.Evaluator.class)
public @interface RequestHandler

    This annotation marks a method as handler for events. The method is invoked for events that have a type derived from Request and are matched by one of the specified ResourcePatterns.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Class<? extends Channel>[] channels
      Specifies classes of channels that the handler listens on.
      boolean dynamic
      Returns true if the annotated annotation defines a dynamic handler.
      Class<? extends Event>[] events
      Specifies classes of events that the handler is to receive.
      String[] patterns
      Specifies the patterns that the handler is supposed to handle (see ResourcePattern).
      int priority
      Specifies a priority.

    • Element Detail

      • events

        public abstract Class<? extends Event>[] events

        Specifies classes of events that the handler is to receive.

        Returns:
        the event classes
        Default:
        org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler.NoEvent.class

      • channels

        public abstract Class<? extends Channel>[] channels

        Specifies classes of channels that the handler listens on.

        Returns:
        the channel classes
        Default:
        org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler.NoChannel.class

      • patterns

        public abstract String[] patterns

        Specifies the patterns that the handler is supposed to handle (see ResourcePattern).

        Returns:
        the patterns
        Default:
        ""

      • priority

        public abstract int priority

        Specifies a priority. The value is used to sort handlers. Handlers with higher priority are invoked first.

        Returns:
        the priority
        Default:
        0

      • dynamic

        public abstract boolean dynamic

        Returns true if the annotated annotation defines a dynamic handler. A dynamic handler must be added to the set of handlers of a component explicitly.

        Returns:
        the result
        Default:
        false
